title: Design BCI System Architecture
description: Create a high-level design of the system that outlines how it will interact with the user's brain and convert thoughts into written text.

title: Develop BCI Interface
description: Design and implement the user interface for interacting with the brain-computer interface.

title: Implement Thought-Pattern Detection Algorithms
description: Develop algorithms to recognize and interpret patterns of brain activity that correspond to specific thoughts.

title: Develop Text-Generation Algorithms
description: Create algorithms to convert the detected thought patterns into coherent written text.

title: Integrate User Testing Module
description: Design and implement a user testing module to assess the system's effectiveness in translating thoughts into text.

title: Review and Iterate System Design
description: Review the current system design and iterate as necessary to address any issues or improve functionality.

title: Write User Manual and Documentation
description: Create a user manual and technical documentation for the system.
